text: Paari (munhu wega-wega), pane ngirozi dzinochinjana kumberi uye mumashure make. Dzinomuchengetedza nemurairo waAllah. Zvirokwazvo, Allah havachinje mararamiro (akanaka) evanhu kusvika vazvichinja pachavo (nekuita mabasa akaipa). Asi kana Allah vada marwadzo kuvanhu, hakuna kudzorerwa kumashure kwawo (marwadzo), uye havawani kunze kwavo (Allah) mudziviriri mumwe
